<script type="text/javascript">
  $(document).ready(function () {
    //$("#FooterBar-Wrapper a").css("behavior", "url(js/pie.htc)");
    if ('False' == 'True'){
      $('.rss').show();
    }
    if ($.browser.msie) {
      $("#FooterBar-Wrapper ul").css("margin-top", "1px");
      $('#aSeoText').css("margin-top", "-20px");
      $("#FooterBar-Drawers").css("padding", "2px 0px 0px 2px");
      //$("#FooterBar-Drawers #TitleBar").width("852px");
    }

    $("#FooterBar-Drawers").click(function (e) {
      if ($(e.target).attr("drawer") == undefined) { return; }
      CloseDrawer($(this).attr("drawer"));
      $("#FooterBar-Drawers").attr("drawer", "none");
      CheckActive();
    });

    $("#FooterBar-Drawers div.drawer").hide();

    $("#FooterBar-Wrapper a.ilink[drawer]").click(function (e) {
      e.preventDefault();

      var link = $(this);

      var drawer = $(link).attr("drawer");

      var active = CheckActive();

      if (drawer == "rss") {
        if ($("#rssfeed").html() == null) {
          $(this).addClass("loading").removeClass(drawer);
          $("#FooterBar-Drawers div.drawer." + drawer).html("<iframe id='rssfeed' src='/rss.aspx' style='border:none;width:100%;height:100%;margin:0px;padding:0px;'></iframe>");
        }
        else {
          OpenDrawer(this, drawer, "30px");
        }
        $("#rssfeed").load(function () {
          OpenDrawer(this, drawer, "30px");
          if (active != "rss") {
            link.addClass(drawer).removeClass("loading");
          }
        });
      }
      if (drawer == "facebook") {
        if ($("#facebookfeed").html() == null) {
          $(this).addClass("loading").removeClass(drawer);
          $("#FooterBar-Drawers div.drawer." + drawer).html("<iframe id='facebookfeed' src='/facebook.aspx' style='border:none;width:100%;height:100%;margin:0px;padding:0px;'></iframe>");
        }
        else {
          OpenDrawer(this, drawer, "31px");
        }
        $("#facebookfeed").load(function () {
          OpenDrawer(this, drawer, "31px");
          if (active != "facebook") {
            link.addClass(drawer).removeClass("loading");
          }
        });
      }
      if (drawer == "seotext") {
        OpenDrawer(link, drawer, "30px");
      }
      if (drawer == "ebay") {
        OpenDrawer(link, drawer, "30px");
      }
      if (drawer == "twitter") {
        if ($("#twitterfeed").html() == null) {
          $(this).addClass("loading").removeClass(drawer);
          $("#FooterBar-Drawers div.drawer." + drawer).html("<iframe id='twitterfeed' src='/twitter.aspx' style='border:none;width:100%;height:100%;margin:-6px 0px 0px;padding:0px;'></iframe>");
        }
        else {
          OpenDrawer(this, drawer, "25px");
        }
        $("#twitterfeed").load(function () {
          OpenDrawer(this, drawer, "25px");
          if (active != "twitter") {
            link.addClass(drawer).removeClass("loading");
          }
        });
      }
      if (drawer == "youtube") {
        OpenDrawer(link, drawer, "30px");
      }
      if (drawer == "googleplus") {
        OpenDrawer(link, drawer, "30px");
      }
    });

  });

		return false;

	function OpenDrawer(link, drawer, location) {
		var active = CheckActive();

		if (active == drawer) {
			$("#FooterBar-Drawers").attr("drawer", "none");
			CheckActive();
			//$("#FooterBar-Wrapper a.")
			CloseDrawer(drawer);
			return;
		}
		else if (active != "none") {
			CloseDrawer(active);
			setTimeout(function () {
				$("#FooterBar-Drawers").attr("drawer", drawer);
				CheckActive();
				$("#FooterBar-Drawers div.drawer." + drawer).show();
				$("#FooterBar-Drawers").animate({
					bottom: location
				}, 500, "swing");

			}, 500);
		}
		else {
			$("#FooterBar-Drawers").attr("drawer", drawer);
			CheckActive();
			$("#FooterBar-Drawers div.drawer." + drawer).show();
			$("#FooterBar-Drawers").animate({
				bottom: location
			}, 500, "swing");
		}
	}
	function CloseDrawer(drawer, toopen) {
		$("#FooterBar-Drawers").animate({
			bottom: "-500px"
		}, 500, "swing", function () {
			$("#FooterBar-Drawers .drawer." + drawer).hide();
		});
	}

function validateEmail(email) { 
  var re = /^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\"]+)*)|(\".+\"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;        
  return re.test(email);
} 

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
  if (days) {
    var date = new Date();
    date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    var expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
  }
  else var expires = "";
  document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + "; path=/";
}

function getCookie(c_name) {
  if (document.cookie.length > 0) {
    c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(c_name + "=");
    if (c_start != -1) {
      c_start = c_start + c_name.length + 1;
      c_end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", c_start);
      if (c_end == -1) {
        c_end = document.cookie.length;
      }
      return unescape(document.cookie.substring(c_start, c_end));
    }
  }
  return "";
}
